@@ -788,3 +788,9 @@ - * Gets the fully qualified domain name for this IP address. - * Best effort method, meaning we may not be able to return - * the FQDN depending on the underlying system configuration. + * Gets the fully qualified domain name for this + * {@linkplain InetAddress#getAddress() IP address} using the system-wide + * {@linkplain InetAddressResolver resolver}. + * + *

The system-wide resolver will be used to do a reverse name lookup of the IP address. + * The lookup may fail for reasons such as the host not being registered with the name + * service.
